description: Lizsa Farmer Service Centre, founded in March 2023, aims to empower young mothers in Makwene County through the cultivation and value addition of the drought-tolerant Nyota bean. The initiative focuses on improving nutrition and income for farmers by providing training, certified seeds, and various products, including pre-cooked beans and bean flour. By promoting regenerative agriculture and innovative farming techniques, Lisa seeks to enhance food security and economic opportunities in the community.
name: Lizsa Farmer Service Centre
